55 using namespace std;
56 using namespace gpstk;
57 
58 // This is a macro in order to retain useful location information in the exc
59 #define CHECK_SV_HERE(itty, prn) \
60 if (itty == almPRN.end()) \
61 { \
62  SVNotPresentException \
63  exc("Attempt to get data from EngAlmanac from a SV that is not" \
64  " present."); \
65  GPSTK_THROW(exc); \
66 }
67 
68 namespace gpstk
69 {
70  EngAlmanac :: EngAlmanac()
71  throw()
72  {
73  for (int n = 0; n < 4; n++)
74  {
75  alpha[n] = beta[n] = 0.0;
76  }
77 
78  A0 = A1 = dt_ls = dt_lsf = 0.0;
79 
80  t_ot = t_oa = 0;
81 
82  wn_t = wn_lsf = 0;
83 
84  alm_wk = 0;
85 
86  dn = 0;
87 
88  haveUTC = false;
89  }
90 
91  bool EngAlmanac::addSubframe(const long subframe[10],
92  const int gpsWeek)
93  throw(InvalidParameter)
94  {
95  double ficked[60];
96 
97  if (!subframeConvert(subframe, gpsWeek, ficked))
98  return false;
99 
100  short pat = getSubframePattern(subframe);
101 
102  // check tlm preamble, subframe id and format #
103  if ((ficked[0] != 0x8b) || ((ficked[4] != 4) && (ficked [4] != 5))
104  || (pat < 4) || (pat > 10))
105  {
106  InvalidParameter
107  exc("EngAlmanac::addSubframe: Not a valid almanac page.");
108  GPSTK_THROW(exc);
109  }
110 
111  short svid = (subframe[3] >> 22) & 0x3F;
112  short sfid = (subframe[2] >> 8) & 0x7;
113  long tow = ((subframe[2] >> 13) & 0x1ffff) * 6;
114 #pragma unused(svid,sfid,tow)
115 
116  switch(pat)
117  {
118  case 4:
119  /* Page with Orbital Elements */
120  /*check PRN */
121  if ((ficked[19] < 0) || (ficked[19] > MAX_PRN_GPS))
122  {
123  InvalidParameter exc("EngAlmanac::addSubframe, PRN out of range "
124  + StringUtils::asString(ficked[19]));
125  GPSTK_THROW(exc);
126  }
127  {
128  int prn = static_cast<short>( ficked[19] );
129  if (prn) {
130  SatID sat(prn,SatID::systemGPS);
131  almPRN[sat] = AlmOrbit(prn, ficked[7], ficked[9], ficked[10],
132  ficked[12], ficked[13], ficked[14],
133  ficked[15], ficked[16], ficked[17],
134  static_cast<long>( ficked[8] ),
135  static_cast<long>( ficked[2] ), gpsWeek,
136  static_cast<short>( ficked[11] ));
137  }
138  }
139  break;
140 
141  case 5: /* Page with Satellite health information 1-24 */
142  for (int i=1; i <=24; i++)
143  health[i] = static_cast<char>( ficked[7 + i] );
144  // manually crack the t_oa and WNa
145  t_oa = ((subframe[2] >> 14) & 0xFF) * 4096;
146  convert8bit(gpsWeek, &ficked[7]);
147  alm_wk = static_cast<int>(ficked[7]);
148  break;
149 
150  case 6:
151  case 7:
152  /* ignore page becase no data for our structure */
153  return true;
154 
155  case 8: /* Page with UTC and ionosphere parameters */
156  alpha[0] = ficked[7];
157  alpha[1] = ficked[8];
158  alpha[2] = ficked[9];
159  alpha[3] = ficked[10];
160  beta[0] = ficked[11];
161  beta[1] = ficked[12];
162  beta[2] = ficked[13];
163  beta[3] = ficked[14];
164  A0 = ficked[15];
165  A1 = ficked[16];
166  dt_ls = ficked[19];
167  t_ot = static_cast<long>( ficked[17] );
168  wn_t = static_cast<int>( ficked[18] );
169  wn_lsf = static_cast<int>( ficked[20] );
170  dn = static_cast<char>( ficked[21] );
171  dt_lsf = ficked[22];
172  haveUTC = true;
173  break;
174 
175  case 9: /* Page with Health for 25-32 and AS/SV config */
176  for (int i=1; i<=MAX_PRN_GPS; i++)
177  SV_config[i] = static_cast<char>( ficked[6 + i] );
178 
179  for (int i=25; i<=MAX_PRN_GPS; i++)
180  health[i] = static_cast<char>( ficked[14 + i] );
181  break;
182 
183  case 10:/* Page with Special Message */
184  special_msg = "";
185  for (int i=0; i<22; i++)
186  special_msg += static_cast<char>( ficked[7 + i] );
187  break;
188 
189  default:
190  // never reached, see if statement prior to this switch
191  break;
192  }
193  return true;
194  }
195 
196  double EngAlmanac::getEcc(SatID sat) const
197  throw(SVNotPresentException)
198  {
199  AlmOrbits::const_iterator i = almPRN.find(sat);
200  CHECK_SV_HERE(i, sat);
201 
202  // return value of the ecc for the given PRN
203  return (*i).second.ecc;
204  }
205

207  throw(SVNotPresentException)
208  {

210  CHECK_SV_HERE(i, sat);
211 
212  // return value of the iOffset for the given PRN
213  return (*i).second.i_offset;
214  }

227  short EngAlmanac::get6bitHealth(SatID sat) const
228  throw(SVNotPresentException)
229  {
230  SVBitsMap::const_iterator i = health.find(sat.id);
231  if (i == health.end())
232  {
233  SVNotPresentException svnpe("SV health not present for PRN " +
234  StringUtils::asString(sat.id));
235  GPSTK_THROW(svnpe);
236  }
237 
238  return i->second;
239  }
240

245  CHECK_SV_HERE(i, sat);

248  return (*i).second.SV_health;
249  }

251  short EngAlmanac::getSVConfig(SatID sat) const
252  throw(SVNotPresentException)
253  {
254  SVBitsMap::const_iterator i = SV_config.find(sat.id);
255  if (i == SV_config.end())
256  {
257  SVNotPresentException svnpe("SV Configuration not present for PRN " +
258  StringUtils::asString(sat.id));
259  GPSTK_THROW(svnpe);
260  }
261 
262  return i->second;
263  }

338  double EngAlmanac::getToa() const throw()
339  {
340  return static_cast<double>( t_oa );
341  }

373 
374  void EngAlmanac::getIon(double a[4], double b[4]) const
375  throw(InvalidRequest)
376  {
377  if (!haveUTC)
378  {
379  InvalidRequest
380  exc("UTC offset (subframe 4, page 18) is not present.");
381  GPSTK_THROW(exc);
382  }
383  for (int n = 0; n < 4; n++)
384  {
385  a[n] = alpha[n];
386  b[n] = beta[n];
387  }
388  }
389 
390  void EngAlmanac::getUTC(double& a0, double& a1, double& deltaTLS,
391  long& tot, int& WNt, int& WNLSF,
392  int& DN, double& deltaTLSF) const
393  throw(InvalidRequest)
394  {
395  if (!haveUTC)
396  {
397  InvalidRequest
398  exc("UTC offset (subframe 4, page 18) is not present.");
399  GPSTK_THROW(exc);
400  }
401  a0 = A0;
402  a1 = A1;
403  deltaTLS = dt_ls;
404  tot = t_ot;
405  WNt = wn_t;
406  WNLSF = wn_lsf;
407  DN = static_cast<int>( dn );
408  deltaTLSF = dt_lsf;
409  }
410 
411  short EngAlmanac::getAlmWeek() const throw()
412  {
413  return alm_wk;
414  }

416  AlmOrbit EngAlmanac::getAlmOrbElem(SatID sat) const
417  throw(SVNotPresentException)
418  {
419  AlmOrbits::const_iterator i = almPRN.find(sat);
420  CHECK_SV_HERE(i, sat);
421 
422  // return value of the orbit elm. for the given PRN
423  return (*i).second;
424  }

426  Xvt EngAlmanac::svXvt(SatID sat, const CommonTime& t) const
427  throw(SVNotPresentException)
428  {
429  AlmOrbits::const_iterator i = almPRN.find(sat);

431 
432  // return value of the orbit elm. for the given PRN
433  return (*i).second.svXvt(t);

436  bool EngAlmanac::isData(SatID sat) const throw()
437  {
438  return (almPRN.find(sat) != almPRN.end());
439  }
440 
441  string int2bin(unsigned int v, int len=8)
442  {
443  string s;
444  for (int i = 0; i < len; i++)
445  {
446  if (v & 1)
447  s = "1" + s;
448  else
449  s = "0" + s;
450  v = v >> 1;
451  }
452  return s;
453  }
454 
455 
456  bool EngAlmanac::check(ostream& s) const
457  {
458  bool good = false;
459 
460  if (!haveUTC)
461  s << "UTC offset (subframe 4, page 18) is not present." << endl;
462 
463  double p51Toa=getToa();
464  for (int prn=1; prn<=32; prn++)
465  {
466  try
467  {
468  double svToa = getToa(gpstk::SatID(prn, SatID::systemGPS));
469  if (svToa != p51Toa)
470  {
471  s << "Toa mis-match on prn " << prn
472  << " page 51 Toa=" << p51Toa
473  << ", SV Toa=" << svToa << endl;
474  good = false;
475  }
476  }
477  catch (SVNotPresentException& e)
478  {
479  cout << "No page for prn " << prn << endl;
480  }
481  }
482  return good;
483  }
484 
485 
486  void EngAlmanac::dump(ostream& s, bool checkFlag) const
487  {
488  ios::fmtflags oldFlags = s.flags();
489 
490  s.fill(' ');
491 
492  s << "****************************************************************"
493  << "***************" << endl
494  << "Broadcast Almanac (Engineering Units)" << endl
495  << endl;
496 
497  s << endl << " Iono Parameters" << endl << endl;
498  s << "Alpha: " << scientific << setprecision(6);
499  for (int i=0; i<4; i++)
500  s << setw(13) << alpha[i] << " ";
501  s << " various" << endl;
502  s << " Beta: " << fixed << setprecision(1);
503  for (int i=0; i<4; i++)
504  s << setw(13) << beta[i] << " ";
505  s << " various" << endl;
506 
507  s << endl << " UTC Paramters" << endl << endl;
508  s << scientific << setprecision(8)
509  << "A0: " << setw(15) << A0 << " sec" << endl
510  << "A1: " << setw(15) << A1 << " sec/sec" << endl
511  << fixed << setprecision(1)
512  << "dt_ls: " << setw(15) << dt_ls << " sec" << endl
513  << "t_ot: " << setw(15) << t_ot << " sec" << endl
514  << "wn_t: " << setw(15) << wn_t << " week" << endl
515  << "wn_lsf " << setw(15) << wn_lsf << " week" << endl
516  << "dn: " << setw(15) << (int)dn << " days" << endl
517  << "dt_lsf: " << setw(15) << dt_lsf << " sec" << endl;
518 
519  s << endl << " Orbit Parameters" << endl << endl;
520  for (AlmOrbits::const_iterator i = almPRN.begin(); i != almPRN.end(); i++)
521  s<< scientific << (*i).second;
522 
523  s << endl << " Special Message" << endl << endl;
524  StringUtils::hexDumpData(s, special_msg);
525 
526 
527  s << endl << " Page 25 Health, AS, & SV config" << endl << endl;
528 
529  s << "Toa: " << setfill(' ') << setw(8) << t_oa
530  << ", week: " << setw(5) << alm_wk << endl << endl
531  << "PRN health AS cfg PRN health AS cfg" << endl;
532  string bits[33];
533 
534  for (SVBitsMap::const_iterator i = health.begin(); i != health.end(); i++)
535  {
536  int prn = i->first;
537  if (prn >= 1 && prn <= 32)
538  bits[prn] = int2bin(i->second, 6);
539  }
540 
541  for (SVBitsMap::const_iterator i = SV_config.begin(); i != SV_config.end(); i++)
542  {
543  int prn = i->first;
544  if (prn >= 1 && prn <= 32)
545  {
546  bits[prn] += " " + int2bin(i->second, 4);
547  bits[prn].insert(9, " ");
548  }
549  }
550 
551  for (int i=1; i<=16; i++)
552  s << setw(2) << i << " " << bits[i] << " "
553  << setw(2) << i+16 << " " << bits[i+16] << endl;
554 
555  s << endl;
556 
557  if (checkFlag)
558  check(s);
559 
560  s << endl;
561 
562  s.flags(oldFlags);
563  } // end of dump()
564 
565  std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& s, const EngAlmanac& alm)
566  {
567  alm.dump(s);
568  return s;
569  }
